message: Hej, you’re finally awake.  Välkommen till Sverige.
Ja, välkommen till Sverige.  Welcome to Sweden!  Are you ready?
That’s the spirit!  Your first mission will teach you a lot...
As your trusted mentor, I’ll  make sure you have all the tools you need, starting with this one:
Our espionage may require some new words.  When you hear a new word, it will added to your dictionary.
Are you ready to start? The mafia foxes have completely destroyed this forest...
The forest is devoid of magic and full of crime…well, their crimes.  Not our crimes, yet...
Our crimes will bring this forest back to life...but wait, you have only just arrived in Sverige...
I’ll let you explore our safe house before giving you a task.
